required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Three-way-cross-over Study to Evaluate Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Lacosamide in Healthy Japanese and Chinese Males
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Randomized Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single-center, Single-dose, Three-way Cross-over Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Lacosamide Tablets in Healthy Male Chinese and Japanese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of lacosamide following single oral administration of lacosamide 100 mg, 200 mg and 400 mg in healthy male Chinese and Japanese subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum drug concentration (Cmax) of lacosamide in plasma.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC(0-t)) of lacosamide in plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from 0 to infinity (AUC) of lacosamide in plasma
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum plasma concentration (tmax) of lacosamide in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal half-life (t½) of lacosamide in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent total body clearance (CL/F) of lacosamide in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F) of lacosamide in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean resident time (MRT) of lacosamide in plasma.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: First order terminal elimination rate constant (λZ ) of lacosamide in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum drug concentration (Cmax) of SPM12809 in plasma.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC(0-t)) of SPM12809 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from 0 to infinity (AUC) of SPM12809 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach maximum plasma concentration (tmax) of SPM12809 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal half-life (t½) of SPM12809 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: First order terminal elimination rate constant (λZ ) of SPM12809 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Total amount of drug excreted in urine (Ae) of lacosamide and SPM12809
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Fraction of dose excreted in urine (fe) of lacosamide and SPM12809
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: Renal clearance (CLR) of lacosamide and SPM12809
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period
Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period
Multiple sampling from 0 to 72 hours following single dose in each treatment period

arm_group.description: 1 Lacosamide 100 mg tablet plus 3 placebo tablets
1 Lacosamide 100 mg tablet plus 3 placebo tablets
2 Lacosamide 100 mg tablets plus 2 placebo tablets
2 Lacosamide 100 mg tablets plus 2 placebo tablets

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy Chinese or Japanese volunteers
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject has participated or is participating in any other clinical studies of Lacosamide within the last 3 months
- Subject is not healthy (eg, taking any drug treatments, excessive amount of alcohol, cigarettes or caffeine, having any psychological or emotional problems, a drug/alcohol abuse, abnormal diet, having abnormal safety parameters)
